attributes.action: Reverse the decision by the DVSA to suspend driving tests during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: It is stopping a lot of learner drivers from taking their test and causing anxiety. In contrast thousands of students are allowed to be educated
attributes.background: Reverse the DVSA decision to suspend driving tests as these are 1 on 1 and subject to strict Health and Safety guidelines

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
